content:
Getting Involved (DASL)

  • How do you join the Distributed Authoring, Searching and Locating group?

    • Mailing list: www-webdav-dasl@w3.org
    • Send message with subject “subscribe” to www-webdav-dasl-request@w3.org

  • http://www.ics.uci.edu/pub/ietf/dasl/
